name: Bush League Hockey
description:
Move: WASD - Left Analog
Body Check: Q - Square / X / ButtonWest
Shoot:  Space - R1 / RB / RightShoulder
Pass:  E - L1 / LB / LeftShoulder
Stick Control:  Arrow Keys - Right Analog

Inspired by classic arcade hockey games like:
Ice Hockey[NES]
Hat-Trick[Atari7800]
Blades of Steel[NES]
NHL94[SNES]
Wayne Gretzky's 3D Hockey[N64]
NHL Hitz[PS2, Xbox, Gamecube]

Using Unity3D these beloved games have been given new life for modern gamers.

Huge thanks to the amazing team at HomeTeamGameDev:
Patrick Thompson
Christer "McFunkypants" Kaitila
Tyler Funk
Gabriel Cornish
Steven "Stebs" Solof
Rob Tunstall
Andy King
Chris DeLeon
